00141 #define MPU_INIT_FLASH_DEFAULT                                \
00142 {                                                             \
00143   true,                   /* Enable MPU region.            */ \
00144   0,                      /* MPU Region number.            */ \
00145   FLASH_MEM_BASE,         /* Flash base address.           */ \
00146   mpuRegionSize1Mb,       /* Size - Set to max. */            \
00147   mpuRegionApFullAccess,  /* Access permissions.           */ \
00148   false,                  /* Execution allowed.            */ \
00149   false,                  /* Not shareable.                */ \
00150   true,                   /* Cacheable.                    */ \
00151   false,                  /* Not bufferable.               */ \
00152   0,                      /* No subregions.                */ \
00153   0                       /* No TEX attributes.            */ \
00154 }
00155 
00156 
00158 #define MPU_INIT_SRAM_DEFAULT                                 \
00159 {                                                             \
00160   true,                   /* Enable MPU region.            */ \
00161   1,                      /* MPU Region number.            */ \
00162   RAM_MEM_BASE,           /* SRAM base address.            */ \
00163   mpuRegionSize128Kb,     /* Size - Set to max. */            \
00164   mpuRegionApFullAccess,  /* Access permissions.           */ \
00165   false,                  /* Execution allowed.            */ \
00166   true,                   /* Shareable.                    */ \
00167   true,                   /* Cacheable.                    */ \
00168   false,                  /* Not bufferable.               */ \
00169   0,                      /* No subregions.                */ \
00170   0                       /* No TEX attributes.            */ \
00171 }
00172

00175 #define MPU_INIT_PERIPHERAL_DEFAULT                           \
00176 {                                                             \
00177   true,                   /* Enable MPU region.            */ \
00178   0,                      /* MPU Region number.            */ \
00179   0,                      /* Region base address.          */ \
00180   mpuRegionSize32b,       /* Size - Set to minimum         */ \
00181   mpuRegionApFullAccess,  /* Access permissions.           */ \
00182   true,                   /* Execution not allowed.        */ \
00183   true,                   /* Shareable.                    */ \
00184   false,                  /* Not cacheable.                */ \
00185   true,                   /* Bufferable.                   */ \
00186   0,                      /* No subregions.                */ \
00187   0                       /* No TEX attributes.            */ \

00199 /***************************************************************************/
00205 __STATIC_INLINE void MPU_Disable(void)
00206 {
00207   SCB->SHCSR &= ~SCB_SHCSR_MEMFAULTENA_Msk;      /* Disable fault exceptions */
00208   MPU->CTRL  &= ~MPU_CTRL_ENABLE_Msk;            /* Disable the MPU */
00209 }
00210 
00211 
00212 /***************************************************************************/
00221 __STATIC_INLINE void MPU_Enable(uint32_t flags)
00222 {
00223   EFM_ASSERT(!(flags & ~(MPU_CTRL_PRIVDEFENA_Msk
00224                          | MPU_CTRL_HFNMIENA_Msk
00225                          | MPU_CTRL_ENABLE_Msk)));
00226 
00227   MPU->CTRL   = flags | MPU_CTRL_ENABLE_Msk;     /* Enable the MPU */
00228   SCB->SHCSR |= SCB_SHCSR_MEMFAULTENA_Msk;       /* Enable fault exceptions */
00229 }
